text: Nipple piercings are a type of body piercing located through the nipple. Nipple piercings are commonly horizontal (especially for a ring), but can also be vertical or at other angles. A ring in a vertical piercing would tend to twist or pull on the hole, and might become painful. ==Gallery== File:Crop_Denie.jpg|Woman with various piercings including nipple piercings with barbells File:Nipplepiercing.jpg|Nipple piercing with ring on a woman File:NipplePierRS.JPG|Nipple piercing with barbell on a man == Related pages == * Genital piercing * Navel piercing Category:Body piercing
title: Nipple piercing
